evidence.claim: Apollo Intelligence utilizes AWS cloud services including Lambda and S3 for their infrastructure.
The platform is built with compliance to HIPAA regulations and employs HL7 standards for health data interchange.
Apache Kafka is used for managing real-time data streams and integration within the Apollo platform.
Apollo supports multiple X12 transaction sets, ensuring interoperability in healthcare data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: Supports X12 EDI transactions and integrates health tech with cloud APIs.
